text: Stuart Orlando Scott (July 19, 1965 â€“ January 4, 2015) was an American sportscaster and anchor on ESPN, most notably on the network's SportsCenter. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. Scott died in Avon, Connecticut from appendix cancer aged 49. ==References== ==Other websites== * *NPR Interview transcript: Is Stuart Scott Frontin'?
